title: Digestive Advantage Fast Acting Enzymes + Daily Probiotic, 32 Capsules
features: Promotes long-term digestive and immune health with continued use
Fast acting digestive enzymes aid in the break down of hard-to-digest carbohydrates to help stop gas before it starts
Helps lessen minor abdominal discomfort, bloating and may help relieve occasional diarrhea
BC30, the probiotic in Digestive Advantage, survives stomach acid 100x better than leading probiotics and yogurts
No artificial flavors. Guaranteed for purity, freshness and labeled potency.
description: Digestive Advantage Fast Acting Enzymes + Daily Probiotics is your solution to maintaining digestive health by restoring the natural balance of good bacteria in your intestines, and helping to lessen minor abdominal discomfort, bloating, and gas*. The unique probiotic, BC30, that is used in Digestive Advantage is naturally by a layer of protein which allows it to survive through stomach acid and reach the intestines where you need it most to promote long term digestive and immune health*. It's the daily probiotic that survives stomach acid 100x better than yogurt and other leading probiotics**. The fast acting enzymes help in the breakdown of hard-to-digest carbohydrates to help prevent gas before it starts all while helping to promote long term digestive and immune health.** *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. **Based on median % survivability of Digestive Advantage probiotic vs. leading probiotic supplements and 19 probiotic yogurts in simulated gastric PH for 2 hours. Survivability and delivery of probiotic cells to the small and large intestines is one of the several factors influencing overall product effect.
